warnings.issue: 5+ years salary range lacked explicit 'average' field in source
warnings.decision: Set fivePlus.average min/max to null; service and product ranges clearly stated

warnings.issue: Programming requirement stated 'at least 2' from list of mandatory options
warnings.decision: Included all 6 mandatory languages (Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, C#, Go) with level='mandatory' and priority='high'
Parsed numeric to extra.salaryNotes.fresherStartups with note field for equity mention

warnings.issue: Note states 'Top-tier IIT/NIT students may receive 50-100% higher'
warnings.decision: Included as context in extra field; not added to salary ranges due to high variability

warnings.issue: Top companies listed with salary ranges (e.g., '₹18-25 LPA fresher')
warnings.decision: Extracted topCompanies.range for fresher salaries; added extra.topCompaniesExperiencedRanges for 5+ years
